transcript:
Customer: Hello, madam ji?
Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: Haan. Maine abhi free ho. Haan, boliye.
Executive: Ji, aap ek baar apna mobile application open kar lijiye.
Customer: Mobile application, okay.
Executive: Ek minute, main bhi login kar leta hu.
Customer: Haan, open kar liya.
Executive: Ek second hold karo bas, main login kar raha hu aapko.
Customer: Maine toh chaar paanch call bhi kar liye.
Executive: Haan, lead consume ki thi kya aapne?
Customer: Aapne teen leads consume kiye hain. Haan, teen consume kiye hain. Kolkata bhi raw incense stick. Uske baad aapne ki hai, yeh bhi Kolkata ki hai, hosiery bag. Uske baad aapne ki hai raw incense stick par aaj hui subject bheja hai.

Customer: Aapne kitne lakh wala order value lagaya? 50,000 se upar wala?
Customer: Maine yani ki description mein?
Executive: Nahi nahi, yeh jaise lead pe gaye, recent pe click kiya hoga. Waha pe all, all India, all ki jagah India select kiya hoga location mein. Wahin pe order value ka option aata hai na, order value above 50,000 select karo.
Customer: Mujhe abhi kaha par jaana hai? Pehle woh teen jo haan uske. Home par na? Click karo. Uske baad jao aur recent pe click karo.
Customer: Thoda main bahar jaata hu isme. Haan boliye. Kaha par click karna hai?
Executive: Leads pe jao aur recent pe click karo.
Customer: By leads, by leads par main gaya. Recent par click karo.
Executive: Recent par.
Customer: Toh location dikha raha hai mujhe abhi. Location all India karu ya search by karu? Yeh toh leads nahi dikha raha hai abhi.
Customer: By leads. By leads pe by leads par click hota hai toh.
Customer: Ab toh recent pe click karu na?
Executive: Haan haan, recent pe click karo.
Customer: Haan kiya. Ab waha pe India select karo, niche. Option India. Haan. Haan, India select kar liya.
Executive: Ab above 50,000 ka option aa raha hoga order value mein.
Customer: Order value. Order value.
Customer: Nearby state, search to export other state. Bulk. Yeh toh abhi order value kahin par nahi dikha raha hai. Catalog views related relevant yeh sab dikha raha hai.
Customer: Madam, kaha par order value aa raha hai?
Executive: Nahi aa raha order value ka option? Nahi madam.
Executive: Theek hai aap India ka toh lagaya hai na aapne? Niche scroll karo aapko orders dikh rahe honge.
Customer: Haan orders dikh raha hai. Lekin agar India dikha toh bahut door ka aa raha hai woh log toh agar Karnataka, Kerala yeh sab nahi raazi nahi ho rahe hain.
Executive: Nahi jaise ek Gujarat ka hai lekin uska order value kaafi achcha hai ek do lakh ka hai.
Customer: Gujarat ka. Wahin par dikha raha hai mujhe kya Gujarat?
Executive: Abhi toh main bol rahi thi 50,000 ka order value wala filter lagao.
Customer: Haan waha par kaha par lagana hai woh mujhe dikhai nahi de raha hai.
Executive: Jaise jab aapne location pe lagaya hai. Haan. End mein ya toh scroll karo ya upar niche kahin dekho option aa raha hoga. Senders. Catalog views related recent India all around Baleshwar, Odisha yeh sab bulk. Haan bulk dikha raha hai 25k. Haan 25k plus.
Customer: Agar click karna hai ek baar. Haan waha par mera kuch jo 50,000 order value filter lagana hai. Yeh nahi dikha raha hai option mujhe.
Executive: Bulk ka laga lo, koi baat nahi.
Customer: Haan bulk isme dikhai de raha hai bulk toh 25k plus.
Executive: Hmm. Lagaya? Haan lagaya usko.
Customer: Ek aapka aaya hai Kolkata West Bengal se sandalwood incense sticks.
Customer: Kolkata ka?
Executive: Hmm. Nahi yeh toh bahut dur Uttar Pradesh, Rewa Madhya Pradesh. Yeh baap re Uttar Pradesh yaha par toh koi bhi itna par nahi lekar Maharashtra, Karnataka.
Customer: Gujarat haan ek dikha raha hai ki pasthuta aur agarbatti. Ahmedabad Gujarat yeh bhi itne door se kyun lenge? Jhansi Uttar Pradesh. Harigram Gujarat. Yeh bol rahe hain aap?
Executive: Nahi nahi.
Customer: Patna Bihar.
Customer: Nagpur Maharashtra. Isko shayad mujhe filter karna padega. Around Bihar nearby state karna padega shayad. Agar nearby state karu toh shayad kuch hoga. Nagpur Maharashtra ke niche hi hogi ek rajput. Yeh toh nearby state agar isko hum. Main agar usko Bihar kare. Bihar aur Odisha. Odisha mein toh. Kyunki kuch nahi hai sir.
Executive: Main aapko video meet ka link bheju kya? Usse main apni screen share karungi.
Customer: Haan video meet link bhej dijiye. Kyunki main apni screen share. Agar main Odisha select karta hu toh yeh sab aapka machine ka mujhe dikha raha hai ki paper making machine, plate making machine. Yeh sab dikha raha hai.
Executive: Haan theek hai, main ek baar join kar rahi hu.
Executive: Main call cut kar rahi hu, theek hai?
Customer: Haan call cut kijiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to filter leads by order value.

- Leads are from distant locations.



Resolution:

- Executive provided instructions to filter leads.

- Executive offered to share screen via video meet.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share video meet link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, filter, location, order value
